previous.excerpt:
Roblox IPO ($RBLX) Analysis:

I am no expert on video games or Roblox, but after some research and digging
these are my thoughts on this hyped up IPO launching tomorrow.

Intro:

Roblox is an online game platform and game creation system developed by Roblox
